AttackerCapabilities: Ability to bypass iframe origin checks

Steps.Description: Bypass the origin check in the iframe.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker's goal is to bypass the origin check in the iframe to gain access to the rendered content.
StepDetails.Action: Embed the iframe via <iframe sandbox="allow-scripts" src="https://so-xss.terjanq.me/iframe.php"> to force a null origin.
StepDetails.Result: The origin is set to null, allowing the attacker to proceed to the next step.

Steps.Description: Steal the identifier from the popup.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker's goal is to steal the identifier stored in the user's session.
StepDetails.Action: Open a popup to https://so-xss.terjanq.me/iframe.php from a sandboxed page.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker sends a simple XSS payload to the popup and successfully steals the identifier.

Steps.Description: Steal the saved note with the stolen identifier.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker's goal is to use the stolen identifier to access the saved note from the main page.
StepDetails.Action: Open https://so-xss.terjanq.me/iframe.php and send an XSS payload with the stolen identifier.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully steals the saved note with the stolen identifier, as the origin is set to so-xss.terjanq.me.
